title: xkcd Phone 12
alt: New phone OS features: Infinite customization (home screen icons no longer snap to grid), dark mode (disables screen), screaming mode (self-explanatory), and coherent ultracapacitor-pumped emission (please let us know what this setting does; we've been afraid to try it).
transcript:
[The comic shows two smartphones: one taller and wider than the other. ][Labels to the left of the larger smartphone:][Labels to the right of the larger smartphone:][Labels to the right of the smaller smartphone:][Text below the phone:]
The xkcd Phone 12* and 12 Max***Standard **For people named Max"The only phone you'll ever own"®™
